description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Avatar Aquarium is a delightful simulation of an aquarium. However this aquarium is filled with Avatars instead of fish. Watch Avatars swim around, feed them, and in the full version, drain the tank dry or go fishing! Avatar Aquarium’s Avatar generation engine makes sure that you have a different set of Avatars every time you play.
